trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality*> is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"></xref> and there are zero <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects that match the conditions of the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref>. -or- <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality*> is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"></xref> or <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"></xref> and there is more than one <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> object that matches the conditions of the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <>*> 是<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"></xref>零而<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>符合指定條件的物件<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"> </xref>。 - <> </> *> 是<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"></xref>或<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"> </xref> ，有超過一個<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>物件符合指定的條件之<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"> </xref>。

Gets all exports that match the conditions of the specified import definition and composition.
trans-unit.target: 取得所有符合的條件指定的匯入定義和組合的匯出。

trans-unit.source: The transactional container for the composition.
A collection of all the objects matching the condition specified by definition and atomicComposition.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality*> is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"></xref> and there are zero <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects that match the conditions of the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref>. -or- <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality*> is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"></xref> or <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"></xref> and there is more than one <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> object that matches the conditions of the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: definition is .
-or- atomicComposition is .
Gets all the exports with the specified contract name.
trans-unit.target: 取得具有指定的合約名稱的所有匯出。

trans-unit.source: The default contract name is the result of calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A> method on `type`.
trans-unit.target: 預設的合約名稱是呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A>方法`type`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The contract name is compared by using the <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A> property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.
trans-unit.target: 合約名稱使用比較<xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A>執行區分大小寫且非語言比較的屬性。</xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type parameter of the <xref:System.Lazy%602> objects to return.
trans-unit.target: 型別參數<xref:System.Lazy%602>来傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The type of the metadata view of the <xref:System.Lazy%602> objects to return.
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料檢視的型別<xref:System.Lazy%602>来傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contract name of the <xref:System.Lazy%602> object to return, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or an empty string ("") to use the default contract name.
trans-unit.target: 合約名稱<xref:System.Lazy%602>要傳回的物件或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或空字串 ("") 使用預設合約名稱。

trans-unit.source: A collection of all the <xref:System.Lazy%602> objects for the contract matching contractName.
trans-unit.target: 所有的集合<xref:System.Lazy%602>合約比對物件 contractName 。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> object has been disposed of.
type is .
metadataViewType is not a valid metadata view type.
trans-unit.target: metadataViewType不是有效的中繼資料檢視類型。

Gets all the exports that match the constraint defined by the specified definition.
trans-unit.target: 取得符合指定的定義所定義的條件約束的所有匯出。

trans-unit.source: Overrides of this method should not treat cardinality-related mismatches as errors, and should not throw exceptions in those cases.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法不應該將基數相關不符視為錯誤，並不應該擲回例外狀況的情況。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality%2A> is <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality> and there are zero <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> objects that match the conditions of the specified <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition>, an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality%2A>是<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality>及沒有零<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export>符合指定條件的物件<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition>，空<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>應該傳回的集合。</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object that defines the conditions of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects to return.
trans-unit.target: 定義之條件的物件<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>来傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The transactional container for the composition.
A collection that contains all the exports that match the specified condition.
trans-unit.target: 包含符合指定的條件的所有匯出的集合。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider.ExportsChanged"></xref> event.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportsChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider.ExportsChanging"></xref> event.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportsChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Gets all the exports that match the conditions of the specified import.
trans-unit.target: 取得符合指定的匯入之條件的所有匯出。

trans-unit.source: The object that defines the conditions of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects to get.

trans-unit.source: The transactional container for the composition.

When this method returns, contains a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects that match the conditions defined by <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref>, if found; otherwise, an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法傳回時，包含集合<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>符合所定義之條件的物件<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"> </xref>，如果找到則為空<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>物件。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數未初始化便傳遞。
